website_summaries.verdict: This unique alarm clock wakes you up gently with a combination of light and clear, crisp sound from its Bluetooth speaker.
pros: Built-in LED light helps to gently wake you
2 alarms with your choice of alarm tones
Display auto-adjusts brightness according to the light in the room
cons: Some users have reported difficulty getting radio stations to come in clearly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This clock has defects -- LIKE, YOU CANNOT SEE THE TIME AT NIGHT -- which I guess we overlooked in other reviews. WE HAVE RETURNED THE CLOCK AND ARE STILL WAITING FOR OUT REFUND!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Floch

customer_reviews.title: Decent Alarm Clock; Not Great for Music or Seeing the Time at Night
customer_reviews.text: I don't share some of the other commentator's dissatisfaction with the sound of the alarm -- I replaced a broken Bose wave radio with this item, and if anything, the sound of the alarm (and radio) is not quite loud enough. But I am unhappy with the widely-reported dimming clock feature. The clock is amply visible by day, but at night, when the lights are out, it's impossible to see the clock at all, because the brightness dims automatically, and so severely that the clock is no longer meaningfully illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable poor quality junk
customer_reviews.text: The LED display began malfunctioning within a month. It conks out about every 10 days. I then have to unplug the unit, remove the battery, and reset the time and calendar. An annoying process. The sound quality is mediocre. OK for spoken voice, not so great for music. Overall a disappointing product. After jumping through many hoops with JBL, I returned the defective Horizon. Two weeks later I received a new unit. Guess what? It’s defective too! The speaker sound quality is fine with FM radio, but garbled and full of static with any Bluetooth source. I have never encountered this problem with any other Bluetooth device. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LtCol Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing potential, bad quality and user interface.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for about one year. Pros: (1) Stylish (2) Great sound (3) Great Display (3) Great Dual Alarm options Cons: (1) Its already not working, won't respond to any button presses. Can't turn of the alarm. Its gone. (2) The buttons are horribly designed, you won't find them in the dark mornings, and they are tiny! ... Big flaw. (3) As stated elsewhere, you don't have full control of the alarm volumes. Sounds trivial, but turns out to be super annoying. I'm not bothering to have it fixed. Its just not worth putting up with this disappointing design. I don't recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaDesert

customer_reviews.title: Do you really want to wrestle with your alarm clock/speaker everyday?
customer_reviews.text: I love my other JBL speakers. They have changed how I listen to music and radio. That makes my disappointment with the Horizon so much harder. The buttons to control the device are positively awful. Turning it off, on or changing modes will frustrate you to no end. Wrestling with your alarm clock radio/speaker in the morning are the last thing you want to do. I was looking forward to having two extra USB ports but one of the two failed within two months. The Bluetooth is great but I already have other stand alone JBL speakers. I’m so frustrated that I’m thinking about chucking the whole thing in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Horizon!!!! At first I was on the fence on buying it. But I still bought. When I got it, I connected it to my phone (super easy with Bluetooth). I also set up the time and date. Started to play some of my music.... and I was completed surprised on how nice it sounds! I usually have music playing in the background while I study. But can turn it up and can still hear it in the other rooms. This thing is small but powerful! Recommend it 100%! (Plus, it has two USB charging ports on the side to charge your phone) I've had it for 2 weeks now and haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Porras F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio. I first used it in a hotel room and was so impressed with the sound quality that I had to get one for my house. There are a few minor quirks with it, ex. if one device is connected to it via Bluetooth but not playing any music a second device cannot connect to play music. This is slightly annoying because we have to find and turn off the Bluetooth on the first device just so we can play music from a second device.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Really nice full feature alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alarm clock. Sound quality is good, form factor is substantial, and functions work quite well. I was looking for something that could hook up to my phone via Bluetooth and sound good while also presenting options for wake up. This does the trick. The Bluetooth set up is easy and the hook up is instant every time plus it holds on for days without resetting. The wake up options include some nice sounds and an option to have the clock light up in conjunction which is a good feature. The buttons are simple and intuitive and the unit is sturdy and refined.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product towards the end of June 2019. I do like this product and its features, and it did operate well all along, but stopped working a couple of weeks ago. I checked the cables and plugs and it all looked fine and no visible signs of damage. When I started to move the connection slightly at the rear of he clock, there was contact and the clock lit up. As soon as I let go of the connection it stopped working. I wrote an email to Amazon a couple of weeks ago, asking if they could help figure this out or suggest next steps. No response from Amazon. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jbm

customer_reviews.title: Best Alarm Clock Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best alarm clock ever. I recently stayed in a hotel and they had this alarm clock in my room. It was easy to use, it wakes you up gently instead of trying to give you a heart attack. It has programable pre set stations for the radio, can connect to your blue tooth so you can listen to Spotify, you have different choices of how you want to wake up. It’s got all the bells and whistles. Easy to read, lighting is perfect. Battery back up, comes with a battery. You will love it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Lean, solid, good sounding atomic alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: First used it in a hotel and was blown away by the sound quality and gentle alarm options. Setting and changing alarm time is still a bit of a pain - never seems to come naturally - but I love that the clock never has to be set. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: I super love this. A bit disappointed at first coz i thought this is really wireless like i can use it without plugging it in but NO. It’s only wireless in the sense that you can connect fm radio and your music playlist form a device using bluetooth. But still i really like it the sound, the color, and the light.
customer_reviews.author: Micks Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Happy - chose the white option.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this clock radio. After searching for just the right clock radio I chose this one. The double usb allows charging of more than just your phone. The dual alarm clocks with different settings allows me to set it up where it beeps first than a minute later it starts the morning radio news. And while I didn’t know what to think about the wake up light, I actually really love it. I don’t use it to wake up but rather as a night or room light and it is soothing. The bluetooth connection. is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia R. Cubas

customer_reviews.title: Just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I love JBL products, so I was excited to get this. Overall, it's just okay. The sound is good, and the clock is pretty easy to set. It usually takes about 30-60 seconds for it to connect to my phone over bluetooth when all my other JBL products do it pretty much instantly, and then sometimes turning off bluetooth on the speaker doesn't actually disconnect it from the bluetooth device and I have to disconnect it through my phone. The backlight is very dim, so even in a dark room, it can be difficult to read it unless you're right next to it. tldr: It's fine, not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The alarm volume cannot be adjusted. So we are ...
customer_reviews.text: The alarm volume cannot be adjusted. So we are definitely up when the alarm goes off! It is way too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker, and its an alarm clock with bluetooth connectivity!
customer_reviews.text: The sounds that come from this speaker are pretty amazing. For such a little speaker. It sounds good. The clock is good, not so bright, but visible at night, hard to see during the day. Programing took a bit of time. I really like how the alarm works, it starts off quiet and gets increasingly higher in volume. I havent used the daylight alarm yet, it looks neat, but not sure how i would wake to it. Im thinking about getting a 2nd one, just for the radio and bluetooth capabilities in another room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Werner aka Dorlar

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the clock, zero for the instructions
customer_reviews.text: The clock works fine. Appreciate automatic dimming of light and other features. Sound quality of radio is good, which is why I purchased it. Instructions, which are in the form of pictures rather than detailed explanations are inadequate. If I set the alarm for a one-time event I still don't know how I manage to turn it off so that it does not repeat the next day. I just press every imaginable button and eventually manage to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Allen1941

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for our old Bose Wave
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to replace the old-school (but great) Bose Wave radio/cd and this does the job nicely. Good footprint, auto-dimming display, BT audio (JBL always make decent speakers) - all the stuff you'd expect for < $100. Sure, would be nicer if it had a remote control but it makes you get up to turn off the alarm, which is kinda the point. The light is a nice touch, and the DST hour-adjustment switch is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Goz

customer_reviews.title: Unique features
customer_reviews.text: This clock radio is best for the person who dislikes bright displays. The display brightness is just OK in bright light and very dim in dark conditions. The nightlight feature projects light from the back and can fade out after a few seconds like theater lighting. The radio reception is decent and the sound quality is better than average. It has two usb jacks that are useful for charging a phone. It has a unique shape and controls, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality for its size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a radio with good sound quality and this JBL did not disappoint. It sounds really good for its size, especially bass sounds. The radio features are what you would expect for any radio. The alarm lets you choose between radio station and alarm sounds, also like other radios. One cool feature is the light in the back. It can be controlled manually but also when the alarm starts it slowly brightens it to help you wake up slowly. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: bluesunset

customer_reviews.title: It'd be a great product if the radio worked.  But it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item. And in fact did like it, except that the FM radio won't tune to any frequencies above 90.0 so as a radio it's useless. I called JBL tech support, but they had no idea, and suggested that I return the unit. Amazon makes that totally painless, so I did, and got a replacement unit promptly. Amazon, you rock. Unfortunately, the new unit has the same problem. It's going back and I'll find some other product. Bad batch? Maybe. But I can't see spending any more time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Twark Main

customer_reviews.title: JBL Reputation
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality on this fairly small clock radio. It's what I expected with the JBL name behind it and it meets my expectations. The time, date and channel brightens during the day for easy reading and automatically dims in the evening so the brightness isn't overpowering. Small footprint fits nicely on the nightstand. Researched quite a few other clock radios and very happy I selected the JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Best part about this is you can set it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Best part about this is you can set it to turn the night light on during the alarm, and you can have two alarms. If you are like me, it takes driving a train through the bedroom to wake me up.....or light. This works perfect. The wakeup to bluetooth is kinda nice too.
customer_reviews.author: USAF99

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: While it doesn't have the amount of bass I was looking for or expecting from a JBL, I still like it. I own a JBL Flip 4 and I've yet to find anything that comes close to the sound of it. I found it easy to set up as long as you go through the steps in the manual. Reception is good, and the buttons are easy to find/use. Pairing with Bluetooth was quick as well. All around I'm pretty satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: DW80

customer_reviews.title: excellent bedside clock, radio, charging station
customer_reviews.text: I encountered this item in Munich, Germany at King's Hotel. I really really liked it and immediately checked Amazon to see if I could purchase it for my own home. I was excited to find it, ordered it, and have been using it for about 3 months now. I don't use the radio much, but really like the dial that is easy to read at night yet dim enough to not irritate me. It also brightens when you move it and has a nightlight option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: Very minimal and hard to understand instructions. I'm a tech support person and I couldn't figure out how to set the time or alarm. The +/- buttons used to adjust the settings are little bumps under a membrane plastic shell which make it very hard change the settings. Not good. There are better and cheaper alternatives out there
customer_reviews.author: dlg521

customer_reviews.title: DISPLAY FLAWED - CAN'T SEE TIME USUALLY
customer_reviews.text: With such great sound it's a shame the clock is a bust. No display in the dark and not readable in the early AM. These were the real reason for me to purchase a clock. I love the unit as a bluetooth speaker & FM radio but I guess I'll have to buy another real clock to see the time when need be.
customer_reviews.author: Thorn413

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Alarm Clock
customer_reviews.text: If you’re buying this as an alarm clock like I did, do not buy this. It is beautiful however that is where it ends. The alarm volume is programmed to skyrocket immediately and there is no way to set it to a steady level. Which means you start out at 1 and then go to maximum within seconds. I like to listen to music at a very low level when I wake up and with this clock, you leap out of bed immediately to turn it off. I gave it time to try it out and like it but wish I could return this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound. Perfect nightstand companion
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent and I love the moon light - warm and soft like a candle. The clock displays both date and time and the alarm sound isn't annoying like most alarm clocks. I didn’t find the buttons problematic like others who reviewed it. I also loved the two USB ports. Charge my phone and Apple Watch overnight conveniently. My only regret is I didn’t buy this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: This radio does everything I wanted from it and more. I have one of their small bluetooth speakers and I loved it. It came time to replace my bedroom clock radio and wanted one that was buetooth capable. The setup was easy. The sound is great! If there was anything I could complain about it would be they dont have an alarm option that would blast you out of bed. Still the alarm I selected works great and it builds in volume slowly. The shutoff could have been a little bigger but it makes me get out of bed which is what an alarm is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: One Glaring Design Flaw But Otherwise and Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best sounding clock radio I've ever had, and its function and features are all as advertised, but there is one major issue with the design that prevents me from giving it five stars. Many of the features have buttons that are not tactile, i.e. you can't feel them. The buttons to activate the radio, the Bluetooth input, the display and the volume are underneath a layer of rubber and are only identifiable visually with tiny white icons painted onto the surface. This is terrible design for a device that's intended to be used in the dark and is especially hostile to the visually impaired.
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to love this alarm clock, I just gave up on it. For one thing, the instructions are terrible. Second, I never did figure out how to turn the alarm off in the morning. Third, when my husband figured out a way to make the alarm turn off, it wouldn’t work for me! Last, the radio did not pick up FM stations very well. So, back it went:(
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: The most gorgeous useless thing I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Great looks! The absolute worse controls on any electronic device I ever owned. The controls are located at the top of the radio, under the flexible rubber skin. Some have a raised surface, most don't. They are impossible to find or distinguish from one another without looking at the top of the radio. It's an alarm clock radio. Used by people in bed, without eye glasses. If they can't navigate the controls by feel, in the dark, THEY MIGHT AS WELL NOT BE THERE! Nice try JBL, but colossal failure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Finkle

customer_reviews.title: The sound is wonderful!  Great clock too.
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical about purchasing this item after I read a few reviews, but it works great. Has great sound - I wouldn't expect anything less from JBL!!! The radio is kind of useless, even with the antenna (you can get some stations, but who listens to radio anymore), but I pretty much use the Bluetooth to play music from other devices. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christi D.

customer_reviews.title: Not for you if you need something to simply plug in and go.
customer_reviews.text: While the sound quality is very good, the instructions are poor and programming is difficult, The control function is crazy - impossible to use at night without picking up the unit and turning on a light. Volume is too loud at its lowest level, Lacking a PhD in Clock-Radio Programming, still working on it! Have always loved JBL products but disappointed in this effort.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this jbl horizon clock and speaker on oct 16, 2019. I was really excited when I got it, and out of nowhere stop working 1 month ago. Is a really nice looking product it doesn't sound really loud but I really like it. Now I don't know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied .
customer_reviews.text: Clock has not gone off some mornings. Total waste of money. Has made me late on my 2 hour morning commute on several occasions. Very dissapointing. When device works it is great.Unfortubately this is a non-negotiable when it comes up to my job and being at work on time. Clock has so much going for it. Unfortunately, I also believe the buttons are not friendly enough navigating through functions based on the buttons provided does seem rather strange just for getting around the menus. Small buttons big buttons
customer_reviews.author: Yours truly....

customer_reviews.title: I'm not totally disappointed but expected more.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice look. Nice indirect lights. Good light sensor taht adjust the panel brightnes according the room light conditions. Cons: Sound quality barely acceptable. Poor bass. Not for demanding people. Unresponsive hard buttons! You have to press them very hard!
customer_reviews.author: GERMAN L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! I actually saw it in a condo/time share where I was staying and admired it. I ordered it as soon as I was home. I love that I can charge two devices in the USB ports. The alarm and light that turns on gradually work perfectly for me. I haven’t tried the Bluetooth yet, but that’s a nice feature. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock display, worst instructions I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this clock after using one in a hotel in Las Vegas. Really like the size of the display and the fact the display dims at night. Can't figure out how to turn the radio off so the clock displays the date. Very frustrating to try to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: best purchase I've made all year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me not snooze my phone alarms by putting it away from my bed, but I love everything else the JBL horizon also has to offer. It has room filling, quality sound, easy to use, great display, the soft light to help you wake up, it has everything you need! It's a must have!! my car has a jbl audio package and these speakers are very comparable with the car's system, if not more crisp. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: What an awsome alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy set up great sound for my sons room good looking has blue tooth feature which is great, able to charge his iPhone 6, it it charge any iPhone. He uses his Bluetooth for alarm music starts soft then increase in loudness. The light is also a great feature as his room is pitch dark. I would recommend, my daughter is bugging me for one now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Longo

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust brightness
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Saw this in a hotel I stayed in. Very upset that you can't adjust the brightness. In the middle of the night I can't see anything. In the daytime it is super bright. I need it bright at night so I can see in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good lucking but fails in some key areas
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality if 'meh' so dont' buy if you need a great bedroom speaker. The off button on the alarm is tiny which is good if you need that to force you to wake up I guess, but is super irritating when you just want it off. One key thing to know also: the USB ports are on the left side so won't be hidden if you place it on the left side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: 12-hour clock will read as a 24-hour clock. 8:00 will always be 08:00
customer_reviews.text: 1. In spite of the photo, I assumed it could be set like ANY OTHER digital clock in the US. Didn't realized that the 12-hour clock would add a 0 to the time. Hate it. 2. You can charge your device, but it won't set the time. Not a huge issue, but surprising. EVERYTHING else about this product is fine, although... 3. it's way more expensive than most of the rest of comparable choices.
customer_reviews.author: steve smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: In my "W" hotel room and immediately liked it. Easy bluetooth connection for apple, could not get my android to connect at hotel but haven't tried with one I bought. Excellent build quality. Somewhat tricky station preset setup but dont let that stop you from purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The display failed after 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: The units display failed after 1.5 years, the LCD display started only showing partial numbers. For the cost of this unit it should last longer than this. I have alarm clocks from 30 years ago and the display still works.. JBL said I was out and warranty, tough luck. The unit is used as all alarm clocks are used in a year round home. Save some money and buy something less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND QUALITY & BONUS USB PORTS!
customer_reviews.text: Small and beautiful, sound quality is incredible compared to iHome & other similar brands. Got this to replace my Sony that had no bluetooth, and to replace an iHome I received as a gift (sound quality was incredibly sub-par). Couldn't have picked a better model, and the 2 USB ports are handy to charge your phone! Just wish the volume could go even louder than it already is, 15 seems like an odd maximum level, but it is only an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH DOUGLAS

customer_reviews.title: Radio alarm set to LOUD, DOES NOT ADJUST.
customer_reviews.text: This clock had everything going for it, until I realized you CANNOT adjust the volume of the radio alarm (LOUD), AND it automatically turns off after 3 minutes. This unfortunately doesn’t perform the functions I need it to. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ask Ena

customer_reviews.title: Beware, broke in less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock radio in January from Amazon. It worked great, up until it wouldn’t not connect to my phone any longer. Lasted less than a year, very disappointing! I hope amazon makes it right as I loved the unit, just want it to work again.
customer_reviews.author: ATLfoodie1976

customer_reviews.title: The clock must be angled exactly perfect for you to actually be able to see the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this clock but it is not easily visible except from only one small angle. I cant see the time at all in pitch black, low light and bright light. It's only when I stand up and view it from above that I can see the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice product, the sound is good, the time is very visible. There are only three alarm options and if you want to add one of your own you have to keep your phone connected - you can't save it on the device or something, which wuite sucks because this device is an alarm clock. Also it fell once from like 1 Meter height and ever since whenever I charge my phone through the USB port it makes this very quiet annoying sound so I just don't use the charger anymore. Overall it's nice but I expected more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Uri

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: After looking around for a radio/clock and bluetooth speaker that has usb ports to charge my devices.. i came upon this beauty. I love it so far. Speaker is loud enough to hear around the house and clear. Not the highest quality speaker/sound... But it does what i need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and a unique style.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it has nice features and I like the double USB ports. The biggest disappointment is the fact that the radio and clock function buttons are impossible to see in the dark. It seems like it would have been easy to have illuminated them. It makes no sense to have to turn on a desk lamp just to find the radio on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kwitny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. It was a much-needed upgrade for me. We originally saw this clock on vacation while at Moon Palace in Mexico and loved it. When we got home, I ordered one immediately. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: You Can Turn Off The Display - No Light Read Out
customer_reviews.text: One of the MAIN features I wanted was "You Can Turn Off The Display - No Light Read Out". It is possible on this clock! However, you do have to careful as the display can come on by itself when the Bluetooth connects and I THINK when the Sleep Timer goes off-- however, I could be wrong about that one. It's sleek (I got WHITE). The sound is REALLY good. Lots of features & options. I HIGHLY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamala Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Alarm too quiet
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased this but didn't pay attention to the purchasers who reported that the flush "touch" controls are difficult to use and that the instructions are next to useless. Both points are true. The reviewers commenting on the convenience of the USB ports and the sound quality are also right. The clock is attractive also and the light makes a nice nightlight. The alarm volume is a real problem too. It escalates but doesn't ever get loud. Frankly I've slept through it. I don't recommend this as an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last but two months
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. Volume control is difficult to adjust on alarm. Then suddenly stopped working to where couldn't adjust time and date and radio would not work
customer_reviews.author: Krista Marrs

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes but could not it to stay plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to receive this alarm. However, the plug does not fit snugly to any of my home outlets. Any slightest movements would make the clock physically unplugged and clock turned off. Hard to explained but I ended up returning this clock.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sthapanachai

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The model we got was used and didn't have the power cord. It was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item. Instructions on how to set up poorly written and difficult to understand. Difficult to read the face of the clock. The only positive thing about the clock is the BlueTooth and the plug-ins for other devices. If I still had the original packaging I would return it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail V. Benjamincu

customer_reviews.title: Very good and bright
customer_reviews.text: Its very good, working fine, and i like the brightness and how its get adjusted automatically, inlike the sound of the speaker, i just its more clear only, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rash-Rash

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for the sound quality.  There is no bass.  Cool extras for a clock radio but too much $$$.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I turned on the radio I knew I would be returning it. The sound is nothing special. Bass response is poor - no bass port. Trebles seem artificially crisp, as if to make up for the lack of bass. Charging ports and waking up to a light are cool ideas. Seems pricey for the sound.
customer_reviews.author: DuckBoyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The gradual volume alarm gets way too loud, way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Siderman

customer_reviews.title: No more cell phone alarms for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. Bluetooth allows me to listen to my podcasts before falling asleep. The light is soft and doesn’t light up the room. The alarm sounds are not offensive. I’d recommend this to anyone who wants to stop using their cell phone alarms, as a way to stay away from a cell phone addiction. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: KarenAbe

customer_reviews.title: Time is lost
customer_reviews.text: This clock loses time every day, some times an hour or more in a day!
customer_reviews.author: vpr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but  sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality...really surprised by how dominant base was in FM playback combined with low volume sound. Looked great in our remodeled bathroom, but not useful to listen to morning radio while getting ready. Product is attractive and simple to set up. However, given my need as morning radio while getting ready, it does not fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Faulty LCD display
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for 2 years, the LCD minute display failed. Pathetic! Make it right JBL! Primary reason I bought it was for the display alarm clock...since when do LCD displays go bad..I have alarm clocks over 20 years old that work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: PeteyK

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to see time!! Extremely dark display!!!
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to see time!! Extremely dark display!!! I have dark bedroom, light sensor adjust screen brightness to impossible to see something on it during a day or night. Unless. Going to return it. Working good only as a speaker. But I bought it as alarm clock. One star is too much for it!!!!!! Don't by it!!!
customer_reviews.author: PETER

customer_reviews.title: Great clock radio!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great instructions, awesome sound (JBL), Blue-Tooth, and the night light feature is a must-have. I also like the 2 iPhone charger ports as well as the ‘flat’ battery (included). Not that I will use it, but the auxiliary audio jack was a good idea too. Will take some time to read the manual to understand each function, but at least it’s straight forward and easy to setup. Got mine today, and just ordered a second one for the guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Baroody

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the JBL alarm clock with light features that builds like the sunrise. The sound is great, easy to use and the light makes a difference, you have to experience to know.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Non-adjustable brightness makes this unreadable at night
customer_reviews.text: It has auto-adjusting brightness that's very slow and goes way too dim. Even hitting the snooze doesn't raise the brightness, and I'd like to be able to make out what time it is when I'm half-asleep. Also the radio has very bad reception. I wouldn't mind these problem if I only paid $20 or $30, but for $80 I'd expect an alarm clock that's useful for more than just working as a bluetooth speaker. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Court

customer_reviews.title: JBL a solid choice!
customer_reviews.text: Technically sound device with Bluetooth and 2 USB ports for charging iPhones, but you cannot dim the display (very bright at night)! Programming alarms is not so friendly either...sigh. Nice design & JBL quality feel though display text is a bit busy hence a three-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: City of Roses

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding alarm out there
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I came across this clock in my room in Vegas. It was just what we needed to get ready to hit the city night life. It's easy to figure out, pairs quickly, different alarm sounds choices, auto dim time. Love love love this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaVonne G.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock, would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Really nice clock radio. The auto brightness and bluetooth round out the impressive features. Sound quality is also great. If I had to pick a con, it is not the most intuitive to program. Even so, it's still a great clock radio
customer_reviews.author: jozzy

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing, and quite loud
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing, and quite loud. Figuring out functions on it is not easy. Turning off the alarm in the morning is a two step process. Buttons are very hard to find in the dark. Need to be raised or have some kind of "feel" to wear they are, everything is smooth, so finding the buttons is hard.
customer_reviews.author: MattS

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cool design, easy to use, good sound quality for its size, but the display is often a bit too dim and difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: C. Antal

customer_reviews.title: Nice try.
customer_reviews.text: The clock has a nice look and feel but the display is very dim in most situations. The radio has marginal reception. The blue sounds is good but not fantastic. Programming the alarms takes patience but not impossible. Have not used the other features yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an ihome unit we've had in our bathroom. The sound is lightyears better. Definitely glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Like overall.
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit and unlike some people's reviews, I like how dim the display gets when sleeping. The sound is pretty good but I have one complaint; there is no tone control at all. So it sounds really good for music but if you listen to podcasts, audio books, talk radio... it is too bass.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I stayed at a hotel once that had these I the room. I was so impressed I decided to get one for myself. I'm really glad I did. I love the nightlight feature and tap on tap off. The sound quality is great and the clock overall is solid. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: wade fredheim

customer_reviews.title: I want to like it but the rising volume of the alarm is ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to like it but the rising volume of the alarm is annoying. I like the radio to turn on in the morning, not get blasted out of bed. :) They should be able to turn this feature off. The speaker sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, easy to setup but no fine tuning...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and, contrary to some reviews, easy to set up. My only complaint would be that you cannot fine tune the radio. You can choose frequency every 0.1 MHz and my favourite station is broadcasting at 94.45 MHz - can only set at 94.40 or 94.50. Small but it makes a difference...
customer_reviews.author: Irek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for application
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my guest room and connnected to an echo dot. Alarm clock, blue tooth, USB to charge devices and Aux input is everything a guest could ask for. Sounds decent too as a plus.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm clock radio, product perform as expected. Only con is the brightness, wish it was an function to adjust the brightness
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing size, easy to link an ipod or phone to it. Sound is crisp, perfect for on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: SC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok just don’t care for the rubber around the top dust collector not easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: lucien filosa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. Has auto dimmer that works perfectly and sounds great! I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Cote

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair magnet. Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I got this in white. Within ten minutes of putting it out for first time it was covered in cat hair. Like it was a magnet and it is extremely hard to get them off. Very strange. this is a design flaw to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for an alarm clock but the sound is amazing, look elegant and small enough for bed side ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw this in one of the hotel in Vegas, I thought it was sleek and sophisticated looking clock. A bit expensive for an alarm clock but the sound is amazing, look elegant and small enough for bed side table. I still can't figure out how to set the alarm clock, it's not ringing when I set it up...I am a bit torn, kinda like the black too! LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: MGJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best clock radio you can buy for the money. Great sound, super easy to use and great connectivity! Bluetooth is smooth and works well. And it looks brilliant as well - great design!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, the volume is not, I expected more power from a JBL. Also, I wish you could turn off the light sensor because it’s too dim in the morning. If there is a way to turn it off, it’s not in the manual, which could also use work. All in all, it’s just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read if you are on the fence
customer_reviews.text: The user guide is really limited and weak, still don’t know how to turn the light on. I also don’t like that you can not adjust the brightness, it’s extremely dim at night. It looks better than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Exum

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable display
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. TERRIBLE display. The auto-dimmer triggers even in dim daylight and makes the display unreadable. So dim it can only be seen in complete darkness. There's no way to override this automatic "feature" (which is actually a bug).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Byers

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm clock ever
customer_reviews.text: Best alarm clock ever. Chic design. Great sound. Great alarm tones allow me to wake up to peaceful strumming guitar. I forst saw this alarm clock while at the Conrad Hotel in Tokyo and instnatly knew after 5 nights, I could no longer live without it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, is junk
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, is junk. As many reviewers stated; Poor radio reception, poor Blue tooth reception, hard to view time, hard to adjust volume & tune, etc. Amazon let me return.. still can't find a GOOD Alarm/radio/ Speaker unit.. :-(
customer_reviews.author: earthman

customer_reviews.title: Great for alarm clock only
customer_reviews.text: I really was expecting something better, but the sound is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality. Connectivity is excellent. The only problem I have is you can't adjust the brightness of display. Display is not bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The time is very hard to see and no way to adjust the settings
customer_reviews.author: lisa king

customer_reviews.title: Wait till they fix the issues
customer_reviews.text: it looks good, it sounds good for its size. Alarm has several sounds you can choose from which is great but it goes from low to loud in a few secounds. While it is nice that it has 2 usb charge ports they make a high pitch sound when something is pluged in and it also wouldnt charge my samsung tablet. This could be a good product once all the kinks are fixed.
customer_reviews.author: timothy martindell

product_meta.title: JBL Horizon - Bluetooth Clock Radio with USB Charging and Ambient Light - Black
product_meta.description: Style:NEW BLACKThe JBL Horizon clock radio starts your day with room-filling JBL stereo sound, enriched with the multi-sensory ambient glow of LED lights. The horizon features two separate customizable alarms, for you or your partner. Wake up to one of three original digital alarm tones, The FM station of your choice, music from your smart phone via Bluetooth or a traditional buzzer. It offers five programmable FM radio presets, and can also stream music wirelessly from any Bluetooth phone or tablet. The horizon features a compact design suitable for placement on any nightstand or kitchen shelf. The crisp LCD clock display has a built-in light sensor to automatically adjust the brightness according to the environment. Two USB ports can Fast-Charge your devices, including phones, tablets and wearables. The large snooze/light button combined with the clear LCD display makes JBL Horizon easy to use even when you are drowsy, and the built in battery backup system ensures you will always wake up, even during a power outage.
feature_bullets: Multi-sensory alarm clock with LED ambient light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars673 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
